Praegu elab koos abikaasa Enega vaheldumisi USAs ja Eestis. 

Elutööauhinna saab laureaat kätte PÖFFi auhinnatseremoonial, mis leiab aset reedel, 27. novembril Vene Teatris. Teise elutööauhinna, mis läheb traditsiooniliselt välismaisele filmitegijale, kuulutab PÖFF välja festivali ajal.

title_en: These are the winners of the 24th edition of Tallinn Black Nights Film Festival!
lead_en: This year, a record amount of films were shown in and out of competition at the festival. Tonight we celebrated the (almost) end of a successful hybrid festival at Vene Theatre in anticipation of the jury verdict. Now, we are very happy to announce this year’s winners!
contents_en:
A special, unprecedented hybrid edition of Tallinn Black Nights Film Festival has come to a festive end at tonight’s Award Ceremony at the glorious Vene Theatre. Although we are sad that not all of this year’s filmmakers could travel to Tallinn, the joy and honour to have shown their films to live and online audiences are ever so big.  

This year, a record amount of films were shown in and out of competition at the festival. In the [Official Selection - Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/) 26 films competed for the award, 18 filmmakers honoured us with the screening of their first feature in the [First Feature Competition](https://poff.ee/en/first-feature-competition/), 14 films were showcased as the best of the Baltics in the [Baltic Competition](https://poff.ee/en/baltic-film-competition/) and 15 [Rebels with a Cause](https://poff.ee/en/rebels-with-a-cause/) shook up our world views and prejudices. [PÖFF Shorts](https://shorts.poff.ee/en/) and [Just Film](https://justfilm.ee/en) showed this year's best shorts and youth- and children's films.  

The films were viewed by [seven juries](https://poff.ee/en/poff_jurys/), who had the task to watch up to 26 films in just a few weeks, discuss, persuade, let their opinions be changed, open their minds, think of opportunities and futures for filmmakers -  all from their own homes, instead of the usual communal cinema visits, dinners and get-togethers in Tallinn. 

Tonight, the fruits of these efforts were made official. And, we are very happy to announce this year’s winners!

See the full list of this year’s winners and comments from the juries:

## Official Selection - Competition

### Grand Prix for the Best Film
Grant of 10,000 Euros, shared by the Director and Producer

#### Winner: ‘Fear’ by director Ivaylo Hristov, producer Assen Vladimirov
![F_1_fear.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_fear_c4db9507ba.jpg)

*Svetla is a recently unemployed teacher in a village near the border. When hunting hares in the forest, she encounters an African. As a law-abiding citizen, she sends the illegal immigrant to the border guard station, but is told that she should manage on her own and she takes the man in.*
 
Jury comment: “A beautifully-made film that astutely balances dry humor with important contemporary drama, this clever, impressively scripted and wonderfully performed feature manages the rare feat of being compassionate and provocative while also delivering striking moments of absurdist humor. At a period when the subject of immigration is very much in the headlines this feature is very much a film for our times.”

### Best Director
Grant of 5000 Euros
 
#### Nisan Dağ for ‘When I’m Done Dying’
![F_1_when_i_m_done_dying_1b77ccc68c.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_when_i_m_done_dying_1b77ccc68c_ce7760586b.jpg)

*Set in a rough neighbourhood of Istanbul, the story follows Fehmi (Oktay Çubuk), a talented 19-year-old rapper who is addicted to bonzai, a cheap synthetic and deadly drug, jeopardizing any success for his music career.* 


Jury comment: “The vision, passion and personality of the filmmaker shines through in this absorbing, passionate and striking new film that draws out terrific performances from its roster of non-professional actors, and cleverly weaves drama, music and even animation as it delves into the darker underbelly of a social environment rarely seen on the screen.”
 

### Best Cinematography
Grant of 1000 Euros
 
#### Noé Bach for ‘Beasts’
![F_1_beasts_d3cb4b3af2.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_beasts_d3cb4b3af2_0b740403be.jpg)

*"Beasts" focuses on victims caught in the bureaucratic cogwheels of this agricultural sector, where life is lived to the beat of the activity support handed out by political powers. Where there’s power, there’s fire...*
 
Jury Comment: This striking film presents a clever take on sexual politics set against the backdrop of working class farmers, with its powerful story given a visceral edge as it follows is lead female character thanks to wonderfully framed cinematography that is honest and non-sensationalistic, and also help the story immerse itself into a traditionally masculine pastoral world.
 
 
### Best Script

#### Leonardo António for 'Submission'
![F_3_submission.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_submission_196131b254.jpg)

*A captivating drama of what happens when a woman files a court case against here own husband for rape. The already difficult situation is further complicated by the fact that the husband is the only son of the deputy to the chief prosecutor.*


Jury comment: This masterful script has been precisely developed and structured in such a way to never exploit its disturbing storyline and is driven by wonderful balanced performances, real intelligence and dialogue to impressers and captivates. The main story may be around the accusation of a rape in a domestic environment, but it astutely takes different perspectives as it tells a difficult and at times harrowing story.
 
 
### Best Actor
 
#### Ulrich Thomsen for ‘Erna At War’
![F_3_erna_at_war.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_erna_at_war_5c88ad8627.jpg)

*Jutland during World War I. Kalle is a childminded boy whose simplicity is so obvious that he would hardly be expected to be invited to enlist in the army. But things go differently. His mother Erna cannot accept it: and decides to follow her son to protect him.*
 
Jury comment: “We wanted to pay tribute to an acting performance that is aware that it’s there to play a balanced yet profoundly dramatic supporting role to an equally fine lead actress, and gives a wonderfully controlled and rich performance that adds massively to a powerful and memorable film.”
 

### Best Actress
 
#### Marie Leuenberger for ‘Caged Birds’
![F_1_caged_birds_ee28a1e9ad.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_caged_birds_ee28a1e9ad_a8fa9ab446.jpg)

*The story of Walter Stürm, the king of prison-breaks, managing no less than 8 times to flee Swiss prison between 1974 and 1995, while - strangely enough - maintaining a sense of anarchic humor throughout.*
 
Jury comment: “Before presenting the award, the jury wanted to formerly recognise the many beautiful and brilliant female performances in the competition selection this year. If we could have had our way we would have awarded seven or eight best actress awards. But we wanted to shine the spotlight on one truly impressive from a mesmerising actress. Her natural, unshowy performance is driven by emotional energy and a fierce intelligence that is truly impressive.”
 
 
### Best Music
 
#### Juanio Javierre for ‘Armugan’
![F_1_armugan_151ed6c13a.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_armugan_151ed6c13a_a56eaeaa1c.jpg)

*Armugan is a Finisher. A man in the mountains, accompanied by the vast sky, the sheep and a personal aide. People are afraid of him, as they sense that he knows something they do not. A Finisher has the skills and knowledge to help the ones who are dying.*

Jury comment: This beautiful black-and-white film benefits from a hypnotic score that wonderfully complements the mood and tone of the film, managing to help weave together the poetic and poignant moments of an often mesmerizing feature.

***

## First Feature Competition
Grant of 5000 Euros, shared by the Director and Producer

#### Winner: ‘Great Happiness’ by director Wang Yiao.
![F_4_great_happiness_f9ae863453.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_great_happiness_f9ae863453_08ddef886b.jpg)

*An insightful, ironic look at the challenges and contradictions that young generations are facing in China. Set in Xining, the capital of Qinghai province on the border with Tibet, this ensemble film follows the ups and downs in the lives of three friends from the generation born at the time of China’s one-child policy.*

Jury Report: “For his strong social commentary of modern-day China, where our three couples are caught between old traditions and the new ways. The movie is told in an original, refreshing, cinematic language, where drama and humor are elegantly balanced by the director. And this simple yet complex everyday story ends up being both relevant, honest and very heartbreaking.”

### Special Jury Prize #1

#### Director Jan Holoubek for ‘25 years of innocence. The Case of Tomek Komenda.’
![F_1_25_years_of_innocence-2.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_25_years_of_innocence_2_270e00c4dc.jpg)

*The life of Tomek Komenda was destroyed forever on a tragic night when he was arrested accused of a brutal murder, convicted in court, and thrown into prison for decades. Jan Holoubek’s debut film is a moving thriller drama that is based on this absurdly horrifying true-life story.*

Jury comment:  “For an incredible directorial debut film, about the horrors of injustice. With a hunting performance by Piotr Trojan.”
 
 
### Special Jury Prize #2

#### Scriptwriters Nora Martirosyan, Emmanuelle Pagano, Olivier Torres, Guillaume André for ‘Should The Wind Drop’
![F_1_should_the_wind_drop.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_should_the_wind_drop_79a3119162.jpg)

*Alain, a French auditor, arrives to appraise the airport of Nagorno-Karabakh - a self-proclaimed republic of the Caucasus - and greenlight its eventual reopening. This airport, with no planes or passengers, opens its doors every morning and welcomes the staff mimicking real activity. The airport crystallizes itself, the hope of an entire territory, fighting for international recognition.*

Jury comment: “For its wonderful screenplay, that brings out the sadly still relevant story on how fragile world peace really is. We can’t wait to see what comes next from these artists, and everybody else in this category.”   

***

## Baltic Competition

#### Winner: ‘The Last Ones’ by director Veiko Õunpuu, Estonia
![F_1_the_last_ones.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_the_last_ones_0bebc13ad4.jpg)

*‘The Last Ones’ explores how in reality the human nature and fate are a mess of reactions, however heroic the stories we weave out of it. In the Lapland tundra, miners pass their days in the expectation of tomorrow. Always looking for something, without understanding what exactly the soul is yearning for.*

Jury Report: “We unanimously agreed on this film for the award. It stood out in all senses: The actors’ ensemble performance was consistent. It was a real team creation, an all-around impressive film, where the team truly lifted it to another level: technically, storytelling-wise, and with its artistic elements. 

The carefully well-thought-through selection of music was cleverly mixed. Conflicts within and between the characters we found to be universal. The beauty of the tundra is captured with masterful cinematography. The struggles within that vast, desolate territory between tradition and progress challenge the meaning of “belonging” and depict the general loneliness all our characters are living in. A modern-day Northern Western.”

***

## Rebels with a Cause Competition

### Rebels with a Cause award
 
#### ‘Dinner in America’ by director Adam Carter Rehmeier.
![F_2_dinner_in_america.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_dinner_in_america_569ee3d827.jpg)

*Simon is hiding from the police. A modest but dogged girl offers him a hiding place. But when Patty finds out that the stranger is the singer of her favourite punk band, the random meeting takes on new undertones. After all, she has sent the boy photos you don’t show your parents.*

Jury comment: “The first of two Awards for the Rebels with a Cause Competition goes to a wild ride into small-town America, following a couple of misfits whose punk misadventures win the heart and ears of the audience.”
 
 
***Ex aequo / Shared with***

#### ‘La Veronica’ by director Leonardo Medel.
![F_1_la_veronica_11361f4038.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_la_veronica_11361f4038_7a2485d9d8.jpg)

*When a tragic accident from the near past is uncovered and the tensions keep piling up inside Verónica, she is forced to admit that real life does not conform to social media filters. Or does it?*

Jury comment: “The second equal Award in the Rebels with a Cause Competition goes to a thought-provoking portrayal of a complex and dark character that finds a pertinent and daring formal device to plunge the audience in the whirlpool of social media stardom.”
 
 
### Rebels with Their Shorts Award
 
#### ‘Stories Keep Me Awake At Night’ by director Jérémy Van Der Haegen
![F_1_Stories Keep Me Awake At Night.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Stories_Keep_Me_Awake_At_Night_a8c112e825.jpg)

*"Are you a girl or a boy?" the psychologist asks the child. The film is the portrait of day-to-day childhood. A village, a family, a little boy who likes to wear dresses, the return of the wolf and everyday life, ordinary, banal. These elements are used to tell of hidden desires.* 

Jury comment: “The Award for the Rebels with their Shorts Competition goes to a troubling, yet sweet fairytale that shows how sometimes you need to follow the wolf, in order to find the path to accept your true self.”
 
***
 
## FIPRESCI Prize

#### ‘Sententia’ by director Dmitry Rudakov.
![F_1_sententia.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_sententia_b74601f1e3.jpg)

*The last days of the life of a writer in a desolate home for the elderly. At every allowed opportunity, he is visited by a literary scholar, a dedicated fan of the poet’s talent, who considers Varlam a genius and wishes to record his very last verse.*

Jury Report: “For the formalistic, and yet poetical showing of how art can shine a light, even if not in colour, on the world of resistance and hope.” FIPRESCI Prize
 
***
 
## NETPAC (NETWORK FOR THE PROMOTION OF ASIA CINEMA) AWARD

#### Winner: ‘Ulbolsyn’ by director Adilkhan Yerzhanov, Kazachstan.
![F_1_Ulbolsyn_f02a0403d7.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Ulbolsyn_f02a0403d7_30b9fc1bf0.jpg)

*Life in Karataş village runs along an untroubled path until its patriarchal way of life is challenged by Ulbolsyn, a woman whose coldblooded heart and blazing temperament are not afraid of setting everything on fire.*

Jury Report: "The Netpac Jury at the 24th Tallinn Black Nights Film Festival presents the Best Asian Film award to the film Ulbolsyn by Adilkhan Yerzhanov, for being a vibrant, stylized, playfully innovative—genre-based but also genre-bending drama; a subtle ‘women’s’ film with a fresh but sincere take on traditional life in a Kazakh village full of humane humans."

 
***
 
## ECUMENICAL AWARD
 
#### ‘Armugan’ by Jo Sol.
![F_1_armugan_151ed6c13a.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_armugan_151ed6c13a_37cd4e9848.jpg)

*Armugan is a Finisher. A man in the mountains, accompanied by the vast sky, the sheep and a personal aide. People are afraid of him, as they sense that he knows something they do not. A Finisher has the skills and knowledge to help the ones who are dying.*
 
Jury comment: "The crisp figurative language of Jo Sol’s “Armugan” pierces the flesh like a stake, creating, through the means of cinema, a suggestive sensory equivalent to the unity of the soul, spirit and body. The film confirms that the body is not weak when the spirit is strong and that the spirit can be strengthened through the body. The film reminds us that the talk about death should not be ideological but demands the remembering of death even in our everyday activities and also the importance of not being alone when dying. The message of the value and sanctity of life rings strong."
 
 
***
 
## LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD #1
 
#### Margarethe von Trotta (Germany)
![margereta von trotta.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/margereta_von_trotta_0c5622e8d5.jpg) 


##  LIFETIME ACHIEVEMENT AWARD #2
 
#### Alar Kivilo (Canada-Estonia)
![Alari Kivilo - credit Rick Thomas.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/Alari_Kivilo_credit_Rick_Thomas_1ed693281a.jpg)
 
***
 
## DDA SPOTLIGHT AWARD
 
#### Francis Annan (UK)

 
## DDA SPOTLIGHT AWARD

#### Armando Iannucci (UK)
 
 
***
 
## INTERNATIONAL SHORT FILM AND ANIMATION FESTIVAL PÖFF SHORTS
 
### BEST SHORT ANIMATION / Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences nomination candidate

**‘Precious’**
Director: Paul Mas
France.
 
Jury comment: "This film uses the artifice of animation in order to get painfully close to very real topics. The jury loved the simple style and precise storytelling which tackles complicated subjects that stay with the audience even after the credits roll.”
 
 
### PÖFF SHORTS NATIONAL COMPETITION: BEST SHORT FILM

**‘Struck by Lightning’**
Director: Romet Esko
Estonia.
 
Jury comment: "A beautifully crafted homage that mixes personal archive with a playful approach to its medium, making for a haunting and memorable film you will want to rewatch over and over again. This film tells a deeply personal, delicate yet dynamic story about friendship, conveying a message that is equally authentic as it is universal. “Struck by Lightning” is a cinematic celebration of life and creativity that feels ever so timely and needed."


### BEST LIVE ACTION SHORT / Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences nomination candidate

**'Between You and Milagros'**
Director: Mariana Saffon,
Colombia. 


Jury comment: “The jury was impressed by the film’s subtle exploration of the complex dynamic between daughter and mother, its stunning central performance and its gorgeous cinematography. The director also displays a remarkable level of craft, care and confidence as she gradually reveals the many layers that exist in all of the characters’ relationships."
 
Find full list of PÖFF Shorts winners [here](http://shorts.poff.ee/en/about/p-oe-ff-shorts/)
 
***
 
## YOUTH AND CHILDREN’S FILM FESTIVAL JUST FILM
 
 
## Just Film grand prix
 
**‘Slalom’**
Director: Charlène Favier
France.
 
Jury comment: “The Jury enjoyed watching all the films and appreciated that the films tackled important and topical issues. We saw many stories about grownups behaving irresponsibly and children having to act responsibly. In many of the films the question arises - who here actually is a child and who is a grownup? And what happens when a grownup with irresponsible behaviour puts a burden on the shoulders of the one person that trusts it the most? There was one film in particular that stood out for us for its incredibly authentic portrayal of a complicated situation. Told from a teenage perspective without alienating or demonising other characters in the film, it was brave enough to tackle issues of abuse and neglect in a very realistic way. A powerful film with very honest performances. We’re very pleased to present Just Film 2020 grand prix for Best Youth Film to SLALOM.”

 
 
## ECFA Award for the best European children’s film
 
**‘Glassboy’**
Director: Samuele Rossi
Italy. 
 
Jury comment: “Of all the wonderful journeys we were taken on, one stood out for its exceptionally well-acted story of overcoming isolation, and translating one individual’s feeling of ‘otherness’ to become accepted into a group of close friends. Despite a well-meaning but overprotective family, our central character is empowered to take control of their own path through life, and gradually his family learn to adapt together with him. For its rich characterisations in a beautifully designed world, and an engaging and well-written storyline featuring friendship, courage and freedom – the ECFA Award goes to GLASSBOY.”
  
 
## Just Film Children’s Jury Best Film Award
 
**‘The Fantastic Journey of Margot & Marguerite’**
Director: Pierre Coré
France.
 
Jury comment: “There were a lot of exciting films and each one of them was interesting and educative. Finally we came to a decision and the winning film was selected because of its fascinating story and strong acting. One girl performed two parts and she did them wonderfully! The film was about managing new situations and doing it playfully. Just Film Children’s Jury Best Film Award goes to “The Fantastic Journey of Margot & Marguerite” - a crazy story of how two girls unexpectedly travel in time and cope in the new era.”


 
## Just Film Youth Jury Best Film Award
 
**‘50 or Two Whales Meet on the Beach’**
Director: Jorge Cuchi
Mexico.
 
Jury comment: “This years Just Film Youth Jury Best Film Award is presented, after long and heated discussions, to a film that sparked intrigue days before its screening. It is a film where bold theme of topic meets with fresh cinematography, well-written characters, professional acting and unique montage. The film met our high expectations and we hope it will be screened in many more cinemas. Just Film Youth Jury Best Film Award goes to  "50 or Two Whales Meet on the Beach”."

 

***

title_en: Black Nights introduces timely Environmental Film Programme
lead_en: There’s a new programme added to the list of Black Nights Film Festival's film programmes. The programme, centering around environmentally themed films, is presented by the Environment Agency.
contents_en:
“This theme has become so **urgent**, that we cannot ignore it anymore,” said PÖFF director Tiina Lokk. 

Environment Agency’s head Taimar Ala commented that the emergence of environmental films at festivals is a sign of the **importance of the theme in our times**. “PÖFF and the Environment Agency are not only connected by the wolf, who is a pride of our forests as well as PÖFF’s symbol. We are also both eager to reach as much people as possible with global themes like **climate, biodiversity, or waste**.” 

The programme encompasses five documentaries. The opening screenings will be introduced by experts from the Environment Agency: wolf investigator Marko Kübarsepp, geologist Marko Vainu, zooologist Ragne Erimäe, environmental analyst Reet Ulm and the agency’s vicepresident Peep Siim. 


![F_1_Barefoot_2e7594ed01.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Barefoot_2e7594ed01_97a3cee421.jpg)
### [Barefoot: the Mark Baumer Story](https://poff.ee/en/film/barefoot-the-mark-baumer-story/)

While walking barefoot across the United States to call attention to the impact of fossil fuels on the environment, Mark Baumer was struck by a gas-guzzling SUV. It was a violent end to an exceptionally creative life.

![F_1_Greta.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_Greta_57054d9b51.jpg)
### [I am Greta](https://poff.ee/en/film/i-am-greta/)

The story of teenage climate activist Greta Thunberg is told through compelling, never-before-seen footage in this intimate documentary from Swedish director Nathan Grossman. 


![F_2_the_hidden_life_of_trees.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_the_hidden_life_of_trees_e5002f5d2e.jpg)
### [The Hidden Life of Trees](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-hidden-life-of-trees/)

Are trees able to talk? Do they have a memory and a social life? The forester and bestselling author Peter Wohlleben gets to the bottom of these questions and opens our eyes to the hidden world of the woods.
 

![F_1_truffle_hunters.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_truffle_hunters_f0592b5744.jpg)
### [Truffle Hunters](https://poff.ee/en/film/truffle-hunters/)

Deep in the forests of Northern Italy resides the prized white Alba truffle. Desired by the wealthiest patrons in the world, it remains a pungent but rarified mystery. The only souls on Earth who know how to dig it up are a tiny circle of canines and their silver-haired human companions – Italian elders with walking sticks and devilish senses of humour – who only scour for the truffle at night so as not to leave any clues for others.
 

![F_4_wolves_at_the_boarders.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_wolves_at_the_boarders_a88edaa4a5.jpg)
### [Wolves at the Borders](https://poff.ee/en/film/wolves-at-the-borders/)

In the Broumov region in the Czech Republic, the last wolf was eliminated two centuries ago. Its reintroduction, like elsewhere in Europe, triggers passionate debate between livestock farmers and environmentalists. Martin Páv planted his camera in the middle of this battlefield.
 

#### See the programme [here](https://poff.ee/en/environment-agency-environmental-film-programme/)

title_en: Europark
contents_et:
EuroPark annab oma panuse Eesti kultuuri ja ühiskonna arengule. Lisaks parkimise korraldamisele aitab EuroPark oma tegevuse ja toetustega kaasa Eesti kultuuri arendamisele ja säilimisele, tervislike eluviiside propageerimisele, heategevusele ning parema elukeskkonna edendamisele.  

Meie sõprade ringi kuuluvad nii PÖFF, Eesti Riiklik Sümfooniaorkester, Kadrioru Fond kui ka Teeme Ära. Toetame doonorlust, puudustkannatavaid lapsi ja võtame osa sotsiaalsetest aktsioonidest. Pargi EuroPargis ning aita koos meiega panustada Eesti tulevikku!
contents_en:
EuroPark contributes to the development of the Estonian culture and society. In addition to organising parking, EuroPark’s activities and support contributes to the development and preservation of the Estonian culture, the promotion of a healthy lifestyle, charity, and the promotion of a better living environment.

Our circle of friends includes PÖFF, the Estonian National Symphony Orchestra, the Kadriorg Fund, and Let’s Do It. We support donorship and children in need and take part in social actions. Park at EuroPark and let’s contribute to the future of Estonia together!

lead_et: Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali auhinnatseremoonia toimus reedel, 27. novembril Vene Teatris. Uudista, mis toimus PÖFFi erilisel maskiballil.
contents_et: Galerii PÖFFi auhinnatseremooniast asub [siin](https://www.flickr.com/photos/poffihunt/albums/72157717074148292/page1).

lead_et: Tule ja tähista pidulikult meiega aasta ühe kõige olulisema kultuurisündmuse saabumist! Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali avatseremoonia toimub neljapäeval, 12. novembril algusega kell 19 kinos Coca-Cola Plaza.
contents_et:
Lõpuks ometi! Pikisilmi oodatud PÖFF on kohal ja avab siinmail enneolematu hübriidfestivali vormis pidulikult uksed erakordsetele filmielamustele. Veel jõuad varuda endale avatseremoonia  [piletid](https://www.piletilevi.ee/est/piletid/festival/film/000003-enfant-terrible-coca-cola-plaza-6-saal-324130/)  ning panna lipsu kõrvale hakkama ka soliidse maski. 

Avatseremoonia toimub iSense saalis, kus antakse üle ka Bruno O'Ya nimeline noore näitleja preemia. Õhtu pakub festivalimelu saatel elamusi kahes osas. Lavastaja **Ingmar Jõela** etendus „Äike” sünteesib mõtliku allegooriana aega, mille keerises parasjagu oleme. Alyona Movko audiovisuaalse vaatemängu taustal põimuvad **Maarja Nuut & RUUM** esituses muusika ning Gustav Suitsu luule. Õhtut juhib **Tambet Tuisk**. 

PÖFFi avab fookusriigi Saksamaa provokatiivne film **„Enfant terrible”**. Portreefilm Saksa autorikino suurkujust Rainer Werner Fassbinderist kuulub Euroopa filmiakadeemia aasta parimate mängufilmide eelvalikusse. 

Fassbinder saanuks tänavu 75-aastaseks. Radikaalne lavastaja ja veendunud elupõletaja kehastab režissöör Oskar Roehleri avameelses filmis nii geeniust kui despooti, kes hävitas korraga ennast ja oma lähedasi, olles sageli vastuolus iseenda ja ühiskonnaga. Ta suri kõigest 37-aastasena narkootikumide üledoosi tõttu, jõudes enne seda teha üle 40 filmi, millest paljud on läinud ka maailma filmiajalukku.

[„Enfant terrible” treiler](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KzQoWa-p5pM).

![F_1_enfant_terrible_95842155d5.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_enfant_terrible_95842155d5_f8237f80e2.jpg)
*Kaader avafilmist „Enfant terrible”*


**NB! Avatseremoonia meelespea**

- Avatseremoonial kehtib inimeste hajutatuse nõue. Palume saabuda aegsasti ja järgida korralduslike juhiseid.  

- Garderoobid on avatseremoonia ajal suletud. Üleriided tuleb saali kaasa võtta või jätta võimalusel autosse.

- Avatseremoonial on rangelt soovituslik kanda maski. Maskid on tasuta saadaval Coca-Cola Plaza fuajees asuvas PÖFFi infopunktis.

- Avatseremooniale ei ole lubatud tulla inimesel, kes on haige, olnud viimase 14 päeva jooksul kontaktis COVID-19 positiivse inimesega või kellel lasub liikumisvabaduse piirang kuni 14 päeva.

title_en: NĀGANAGA
contents_et:
- **PÖFFi kaelakaardi omanikele 33% soodustust**

**Anne Vetik, PÖFFi fänn ja kirjutaja soovitab**

4 aastat tagasi nägid Priidu, Eri, Siim ja Riina ühesugust unenägu: neile ilmutas end kahe peaga madu, kes jõi džinntoonikut ja nõudis, et nad avaksid vanalinna kõige ägedama baari. Nii sündis Naganaga, kus sind ootab Tallinna kõige sõbralikum baarilett, festivali kõige kreisimad peod ja uued parimad sõbrad. Kui ei usu, küsi näiteks Henningult, kes on pöörase filmi „YUNG“ autoriks, või Takeolt, kes juhatab Tokyo Filmifestivali. Puhtalt logistiliselt ning avamisaegade mõttes on Naga parim, kui sul on tahtmist pärast hilist seanssi teha mõned dringid, süüa ja sotsialiseeruda. Tantsida ja muusikat kuulata ka muidugi. Luban, et on lõbus! 

Uus 25

660 2559

FB: barnaganaga

@barnaganaga
contents_en:
- **33% discount with a Festival badge**

**Anne Vetik, fan of PÖFF and essayist recommends**

Four years ago, Priidu, Eri, Siim and Riina all had the same dream: a two-headed snake appeared to them, drinking gin’n’tonic, and told them to open the most wicked and cool bar in the Old Town of Tallinn. That was the birth of Naganaga where you will find the friendliest bar in Tallinn, the craziest parties of the Festival and the best new friends. If you don’t believe me ask Henning, the director of a wacky film called ‘YUNG’, or Takeo, the head of the Tokyo Film Festival. Purely logistically and opening times-wise Naga is the best place if you’d like to have some drinks, something to eat and to socialise after a late-night screening. And to dance and listen to music, of course. I promise you’ll have fun! 

Uus 25

660 2559

title_et: KinoFF toimub juba kolmes Ida-Viru linnas
title_ru: Фестиваль современного российского кино KinoFF 2020 пройдет в трех городах Ида-Вирумаа
lead_et: Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali harufestival [KinoFF](https://kinoff.ee) laieneb tänavu Jõhvi. Uusi vene filme saab endiselt näha ka Narvas ja Kohtla-Järvel.
lead_ru: C 13 по 29 ноября пройдет второй фестиваль современного российского кино KinoFF. Фестиваль пройдет в трех городах: Кохтла-Ярве, Нарве и Йыхви.
contents_et:
13.–29. novembrini toimuva festivali kavas on Vene filmikunsti kõige värskemad teosed, millest osa on juba pälvinud tähelepanu ja tunnustust rahvusvahelistel festivalidel.

KinoFFi avab mullu PÖFFil elutööauhinna saanud Andrei Kontšalovski film „Kallid seltsimehed”, mis põhineb nõukogude ajal mahavaikitud ajaloolisel sündmusel – 1962. aastal Novotšerkasskis toimunud tööliste demonstratsioonil, mille laialiajamisel hukkus ligemale 30 inimest. Film võitis tänavusel Veneetsia festivalil eripreemia ja kuulub ka PÖFFi programmi.

Ivan I. Tverdovski „Konverents” märgiti ära Veneetsia festivali kõrvalprogrammis „Veneetsia päevad”. Andrei Hržanovski animafilm „Nina ehk Teistsuguste vandenõu” sai aga maailma tuntuimal animafilmide festivalil Annecy´s eripreemia.

Festivali kavas on ka laste- ja noortefilmid, millest Anastassija Paltšikova „Maša” võitis Vene rahvuslikul filmifestivalil „Kinotavr” parima debüütfilmi auhinna.

KinoFFi peaprodutsendi Jana Budkovskaja sõnul on idavirumaalastel hea võimalus näha filme, mis kaunistaksid iga festivali programmi. „Andrei Kontšalovski pälvis tunnustust Veneetsias. Aleksei Utšiteli „Tsoi” on juba enne esilinastust peaaegu et kuulsaim Vene film. Samuti on meeldiv, et sel aastal õnnestus pandeemiast hoolimata festivali geograafiat laiendada,” ütles ta.

Eesti filmidest linastuvad Lauri Randla mängufilm „Hüvasti, NSVL”, Aljona Suržikova dokumentaalfilm „Ankeet“ ja Natalja Matšenene lühifilm „Ohver“. Kavas on ka virtuaalreaalsuse filmid ja eriprogramm „Comic Con”.

13.–15. novembrini Kohtla-Järvel, 20.–22. novembrini Narvas ja 27.-29. novembrini Jõhvis toimuva KinoFFi piletimüük algab 6. novembril. Esimest korda on müügil ka festivalipassid.

KinoFFi korraldavad Pimedate Ööde filmifestival, loomeinkubaator OBJEKT ja meediaportaal RusDelfi. Festivali toetavad Kohtla-Järve, Narva ja Jõhvi linn ning Integratsiooni Sihtasutus.
contents_ru:
Уже второй год Северо-Восток Эстонии станет площадкой для кинопоказов современного российского кино. В программе главные новинки российского кино, которые заявили о себе на «Кинотавре» и Венецианском фестивале, авторские работы, а также киноленты, которые должны в ближайшее время выйти в широкий прокат.

«Мы сможем представить зрителям Ида-Вирумаа фильмы, которые способны украсить собой любой фестиваль. Так, фильм «Дорогие товарищи!» Андрея Кончаловского удостоен специального приза жюри на Венецианском кинофестивале, а «Цой» Алексея Учителя еще до своей премьеры стал едва ли не самым известным российским фильмом года. Кажется, это становится визитной карточкой данного режиссера после выхода «Матильды». Также приятно, что в этом году, несмотря на пандемию, нам удалось расширить географию фестиваля», - прокомментировала генеральный продюсер Яна Будковская.  
 
В рамках спецпоказов пройдут премьеры эстонских фильмов «До свидания, Советский Союз!» режиссера Лаури Рандла, документального фильма «Анкета» Алены Суржиковой и короткометражного фильма «Жертва» режиссера Натальи Маченене. В отдельной программе фестиваля представлены фильмы виртуальной реальности и подпрограмма Comic Con.
 
Полную программу фильмов, мероприятий, кинотеатров и пунктов продажи билетов фестиваля можно найти на сайте www.kinoff.ee. Продажа билетов стартует 6 ноября. Впервые все желающие смогут приобрести фестивальный абонемент для просмотра всех фильмов.
 
Фестиваль KinoFF организует Таллиннский кинофестиваль «Тёмные ночи», творческий инкубатор OBJEKT, а также информационный портал RusDelfi при финансовой поддержке города Кохтла-Ярве, Нарвы, Йыхви и Фонда интеграции Эстонии.

***

**В основную программу фестиваля KinoFF 2020 входят следующие фильмы:**
 
**«Ключ времени»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Алексей Тельнов
**«Скажи ей»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Александр Молочников
**«Маша»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Анастасия Пальчикова
**«До свидания, Советский Союз!»**, Финляндия, Эстония; 2020, режиссер Лаури Рандла
**«Конференция»**, Россия, Эстония, Италия, Великобритания; 2020, режиссёр Иван И. Твердовский
**«Цой»**, Россия, Латвия; 2020, режиссёр Алексей Учитель
**«Дорогие товарищи!»**, Россия, 2020, режиссер Андрей Кончаловский
**«Земля Эльзы»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Юлия Колесник
**«Нос, или Заговор "не таких"»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Андрей Хржановский
**«Русская смерть»**, Россия, 2020, режиссёр Владимир Мирзоев
**«Северная охота»**, Россия, Казахстан; 2020, режиссёр Алексей Егоров
**«Анкета»**, Эстония, 2020, режиссёр Алена Суржикова
**«Жертва»**, Эстония, 2020, режиссёр Наталья Маченене 
**«Вмешательство»**, Россия 2020, режиссер Ксения Зуева

title_en: How do I watch the best of PÖFF at home?
lead_en: For the first time in the festival’s history viewers based in Estonia can now watch films from your home, at the time that suits best for you. Find out how.
contents_en:
Black Nights is now double: in the cinemas and at home! For the first time in the festival’s history viewers based in Estonia can now watch films from your home, at the time that suits best for you. 

NB:
- This feature only works for people based in Estonia. If you are film professional, please apply for accreditation and go to [this page](proscreen.poff.com) to watch the films.
- Due to safety reasons not related to the festival, the film viewing platform kino.poff.ee and proscreen.poff.ee can only be operated on the following web browsers:
EDGE on PCs
SAFARI on macs
- You cannot use Google’s browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Opera) due to a security leak that was just discovered in Google’s safety systems and is currently being fixed by the company.
- Viewing is only enabled on the aforementioned browsers as the security of the films and protecting the interests of the filmmakers is paramount for us.
We are very sorry for the inconveniences this might cause for our audience!


**How to buy virtual PÖFF tickets?**

1.	The information of virtual screenings can be found on [film profile pages](https://poff.ee/en/search_film/) on the PÖFF web site or directly on the film watching platform [kino.poff.ee](https://kino.poff.ee) where you can see all the films that are available for virtual viewing. There you can also purchase the viewing rights. 
2.	All virtual tickets can only be purchased at [kino.poff.ee](https://kino.poff.ee) after creating an account there. The ticket will also be sent to your email from our address abi@poff.ee.

**NB!** 
- Not all PÖFF films can be watched virtually.
- Films will become available for viewing in the online environment only 3 hours after their physical premiere at PÖFF.
- Bought ticket to virtual screeningns are valid for 48 hours - after you have bought the ticket to viertual screening, you have 48 to start watching it. 
- After you have started watching the film, you have 30 hours to finish watching the film.  
- Sadly, due to technical restraints, the environment is only in Estonian this year and films can be seen only from Estonia. But navigation is really easy there, so hopefully, English-speakers can manage. All film synopses and details can be found on the festival’s homepage [www.poff.ee/en](https://www.poff.ee/en).
- As with regular screenings, the number of people who can watch the virtual screenings is limited for every film. These limits vary by film.


**How to watch virtual films?**

1.	Log in to the environement [kino.poff.ee](https://kino.poff.ee).
2.	All films you have purchased virtual access to can be found in the subpage „Minu filmid“. If you have purchased a ticket during presale, you will have to wait until 3 hours have passed from the moment the film has begun its first cinema screening at Black Nights to see it. 
3.	To watch a film, press the button „Mängi“. To select subtitles, press the CC icon on the right-hand side of the player. Please note that many films that are in English don’t have subtitles.
4.	After purchasing the ticket, you can also go to the virtual screening via the ticket confirmation email you get from our account abi@poff.ee. Just open the email and click the button „Vaata filmi“.

If you run into trouble, please write to abi@poff.ee
Enjoy the films!

title_en: Kolm Tilli
contents_et:
Kastani 42, Tartu
56277753
FB: KolmTilli IG: KolmTilli
[www.kolmtilli.ee](www.kolmtilli.ee)


Kolm Tilli on laia maailma tänavaköögist inspireeritud restoran Tartu Aparaaditehases. Söögikoha läbivaks kontseptsiooniks on tänavatoidu valmistamine – koha südameks on avatud köök, mille kõrval seisavad eraldi pitsa valmistamise ja pagaritoodete nurgad ning kõike seda toetab maailmaklassi baar. Stiilselt muudetud vanad tehase ruumid on ideaalseks kohaks tänavatoidu pakkumiseks. Külastajatel on võimalik lihtsasti jälgida, kuidas nende söök ja joogid valmivad. Nädalapäevadel naudi isuäratavat hommikusööki või proovi lõunasööki. Õhtusöögil on võimalik valik teha kogu menüüst, mis sisaldab suurt hulka klassikalist tänavatoitu, mida igaüks võib ette kujutada. Kindlasti tasub proovida üle riigi kuulsaid pitsasid. Kõige selle juurde lisa suurepärased joogid, sõbrlik ja hoolitsev teenindus ning Kolm Tilli suudab ka kõige nõudlikuma külalise meele järgi olla. Üks kõige populaarsematest restoranidest kogu Eestis tervitab oma külalisi igapäevaselt esmaspäevast pühapäevani.  


PÖFFi pileti või kaelakaardiga soodustus 10%
contents_en:
Kastani 42, Tartu
56277753
FB: KolmTilli IG: KolmTilli
[www.kolmtilli.ee](www.kolmtilli.ee)


Kolm Tilli is a street food-inspired restaurant in Tartu’s Aparaaditehas Creative City. The space features an open kitchen at its heart and separate areas for baking pizza and baked goods as well as a world-class bar. This stylishly converted warehouse is the perfect location for a street food restaurant where guests can enjoy watching their food and drinks get prepared. On weekdays, tuck into a hearty breakfast or come for lunch. At dinner time, have your pick from the entire menu, which boasts just about any kind of classic street food you could think of. Their nationwide famous pizzas are a must! Add to the mix a great drinks list and the restaurant’s friendly, attentive service and you've got a great place to take even the fussiest of eaters. One of the most popular restaurants in all of Estonia welcomes people every day from Monday to Sunday.


10% discount with the Festival ticket or badge

title_en: On day 9 of Black Nights there is an equal place for youthful dreams as well as memories
lead_en: In the selection of this Saturday's films, we find odes to youth and the youthful, but also films that are dedicated to memories - for one cannot exist without the other. In our selection is also a special film presented in the memory of its director, Zaza Urushadze, the loved Georgian director that left us far too soon, last year.
contents_en:
It's a festival different from any we have experienced before. Instead of drinks, special events, and late night festivities, international film guests take a morning dip into the Finnish gulf, visit as much film screenings as they can and take a quiet stroll around the town. But: it's wonderful to be able to receive a handful of guests, even in these special circumstances. Today, we will have four screenings with special guests attending and several international premieres. 

Take a look at today's recommendations, and see the whole programme for today [here](https://poff.ee/en/search_screening/?dates=11/21/2020). 


![F_1_love_song_1980.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_love_song_1980_d1adb84a26.jpg)
### [Love Song 1980 (European Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/love-song-1980/)
**13:00 | Coca-Cola iSense**

Fascinating adaptation of the novel 80s Lovers by Yu Xiaodan, "Love Song 1980" is the latest movie from acclaimed director and scriptwriter Mei Feng. An ode to youth, love and its drives, the film is set in Beijing in the early 1980s, during that complex decade that forever changed the course of history in China, at a time when the country opened up to the global market letting novel ideas come sweeping in.

Regarded as the prequel to Lou Ye’s much admired "Summer Palace" - which Mei Feng co-wrote - the film is an epic saga that renders an accurate picture of China’s young generations of the time, with their utopias and desires, immersing the spectators in the warm hues of a fluid narrative.

[Part of the Official Selection - Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/)


![F_5_sanremo.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_5_sanremo_3f7297e84e.jpg)
### [Sanremo (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/sanremo/)
**16:00 | Coca-Cola Plaza iSense**
**21:00 | Virtual Hall**

The first frame of the film says everything that needs to be said – an old man sitting alone on a bench beside a road, blanketed in mist. Bruno wants to go home, he needs to feed his dog, but he is not quite sure where home is. He is lost in himself. His memory and sense of reality are fractured. Right beside the bench, there is a big tree – so big that it does not even fit in the frame. Nature is a separate character in Miroslav Mandić’s lifelike film – the transient and the eternal are constantly side by side here.

Bruno actually lives at a home for the elderly and is in love with a co-resident named Dusa. Their love story is fragmented, as they tend to constantly forget each other. Thus, they can always meet for the first time. 

[Part of the Official Selection - Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/)


![F_1_nest_of_winds.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_nest_of_winds_97a4dfea7b.jpg)
### [Nest of Winds](https://poff.ee/en/film/nest-of-winds/)
**16:45 | Artis 1**

The end of the war brings no comfort for landowner Jüri Piir (Rudolf Allabert), because he has to try to satisfy the demands of both the forest brothers and the Soviet authorities. In a complicated situation, remaining impartial becomes exceedingly difficult.

Part of our special [Estonian retrospective film programme](https://poff.ee/en/101-estonian-films/), curated by film critic Tristan Priimägi. 


![F_2_anton.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_anton_35229e1c38.jpg)
### [Anton](https://poff.ee/en/film/anton/)
**18:00 | Apollo Solaris 3 + Q&A with Natalia Rjumina, Sebastian Anton**
**21:00 | Virtual Hall**

The cinematic swan song of Georgian Director, who left us too shockingly soon. A debut novel "Anton, a young boy, his friend and the Russian Revolution" by Canadian writer Dale Eisler inspired Zaza to construct another emotional tearful war tale in classical flashbacks from memories of older witnesses. They are elegantly played by Lithuanian grand veteran actors Regimantas Adomaitis, Juozas Budraitis and Vaiva Mainelytė. 
Raised in a Catholic family curious Anton gets along fondly with neighbour Jakob, who is a Jew. Such friendships are hardly imaginable in heated up political circumstances and economic calamity, but brave boys aren’t afraid of anyone in fantasies of the imaginary worlds. 


![F_1_when_i_m_done_dying_1b77ccc68c.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_when_i_m_done_dying_1b77ccc68c_ce7760586b.jpg)
### [When I’m Done Dying (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/when-i-m-done-dying/)
**18:30 | Coca-Cola Plaza iSense + Q&A with Nisan Dag, Oktay Cubuk**
**21:30 | Virtual Hall** 

Turkish writer-director Nisan Dağ rose to prominence six years ago with her debut feature, “Across the Sea”, which she co-directed with Esra Saydam and which was awarded at multiple festivals. Inspired by the hip-hop culture of Istanbul, she is presenting her much anticipated sophomore feature “When I’m Done Dying”.
Set in a rough neighbourhood of Istanbul, the story follows Fehmi (Oktay Çubuk), a talented 19-year-old rapper who is addicted to bonzai, a cheap synthetic and deadly drug, jeopardizing any success for his music career. Fehmi will cross paths with Devin (Hayal Köseoğlu), a 25-year-old upperclass DJ, who is also a lost soul. They will fall hard for each other, and by spending time together, they will find love and the inspiration they were lacking, which will be expressed through music. 

[Part of the Official Selection - Competition](https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/)


![F_3_bula_83fdd635cd.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_bula_83fdd635cd_7599a90ff9.jpg) 
### [Bula (World Premiere) ](https://poff.ee/en/film/bula/)
**19:00 | Coca-Cola Plaza 4 LUXE + Q&A with Clara Brandt, Sebastien Tixador, Boris Baum**
**22:00 | Virtual Hall**

Marcelo likes to play black metal with his solo band, tinker with amateur science and wear a suit whenever it seems even the least bit appropriate. His destitute situation in a conformist Belgian suburb pales compared to his uncle who prefers to wear dresses and sometimes even naughty fishnet stockings. At the beginning of summer, an unexpected message arrives about the death of Marcelo’s father who was an anthropologist. That gives the dynamic duo an opportunity to escape the debilitating mediocracy and to travel to a faraway island to find out the truth about what happened.

[Part of our Rebels with a Cause competition](https://poff.ee/en/rebels-with-a-cause/)

![F_1_dinner_in_america.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_dinner_in_america_82c6e01adc.jpg)
### [Dinner in America](https://poff.ee/en/film/dinner-in-america/)
**19:15 Coca-Cola Plaza 8 + Q&A with Dave Hunter**
**22:15 Virtual Hall** 

Simon is hiding from the police. A modest but dogged girl offers him a hiding place. But when Patty finds out that the stranger is the singer of her favourite punk band, the random meeting takes on new undertones. After all, she has sent the boy photos you don’t show your parents. Cynical Simon could take advantage of the situation, but is prevented from doing so by a peculiar attraction – which is probably called love. The youngsters go on a journey where they find that completely different people can still have something in common.

[Part of our Rebels with a Cause competition](https://poff.ee/en/rebels-with-a-cause/)
 
![F_1_oasis.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_oasis_3f76cff779.jpg)
### [Oasis](https://poff.ee/en/film/oasis/)
**21:30 | Coca-Cola Plaza 4 LUXE**

Upon her arrival at an institution for people with mental disabilities, Maria becomes fast friends with the equally fiery Dragana. When it becomes clear that they are both in love with the more withdrawn Robert, their relationship is upset and gradually grows into a dangerous game of hide-and-seek to win him over.
 
![F_2_submission.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_submission_129c7fb340.jpg)
### [Submission](https://poff.ee/en/film/submission/)
**21:15 | Coca-Cola Plaza iSense**

Director and screenwriter Leonardo Antonio has done a lot of thorough research to give us a captivating drama of what happens when a woman files a court case against here own husband for rape. The already difficult situation is further complicated by the fact that the husband is the only son of the deputy to the chief prosecutor. The power balance is entirely askew and in addition to everything else the woman has to face the obsolete beliefs of the patriarchal society, which are embedded in the entire Portuguese court system. We see step by step what happens to a woman and her life in such a situation. The peak of “Submission” is doubtlessly a court scene which takes place almost in real time and gives the audience the chance to hear out all the parties.
Part of the Official Selection - Competition https://poff.ee/en/official-selection/
 

![F_4_rival.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_rival_d20347698f.jpg)
### [Rivale](https://poff.ee/en/film/rivale/)
**21:45 | Artis 2**

A boy and a gun. We see this image right in the beginning of the film, and without doubt, the world of 9-year-old Roman is a dangerous and endangered one. He follows his Ukrainian mother to Germany, where she starts working illegally for 62-year-old Gert with whom she becomes romantically involved. Gert tries to befriend the boy, but Roman keeps his distance. When his mother falls ill, Roman stays alone with his Rival. A short period of coming closer follows, then Roman remains alone…

Part of New German Cinema Focus Programme https://poff.ee/en/in-focus-new-german-cinema/
contents_ru: [РАСПИСАНИЕ СЕАНСОВ НА 21 НОЯБРЯ](https://poff.ee/film/indiaanipoiss-yakari-suur-seiklus/)

title_et: PÖFFi kolmapäevane programm paneb käiku väega naised ja keelatud viljad
lead_et: Kolmapäev loob tunderuumi unistustele ja allasurutud fantaasiatele. Sellel tundeilma ja filmimaailma ristumisel süttib kirg, elujanu ning isu kõige selle järgi, mida harilik kulgemine mugavustsoonis pakkuda ei suuda. Tänast programmi kannavad inspireerivalt heidutamatud naised, kes ei tagane enda eesmärgist etteantud elureegleid ümber kirjutada.
contents_et:
**Avasta kolmapäevaseid PÖFFi filmielamusi [siit](https://poff.ee/otsi_seanssi/?dates=11/18/2020).**


![F_1_caged_birds_ee28a1e9ad.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_caged_birds_ee28a1e9ad_a8fa9ab446.jpg)

## [Puurilinnud](https://poff.ee/film/puurilinnud/)
- [18. nov, kolmapäev 20:15. iSense saal Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=323211&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

- Rahvusvaheline esilinastus, külalisteks Oliver Rihs, Ivan Madeo, Jan Krüger, Felix von Muralt

Barbara Hug on mässumeelne advokaat, kes võitleb iganenud karistusseaduse vastu. Walter Stürm aga kurikuulus kontrakultuuri mässumeelne posterpoiss, kelle leivanumbriks on vanglast põgenemine. Aegruumiks on heitlik Šveits kaheksakümnendatel.

Tõestisündinud loo põhjal valminud põnevik pakub haaravas tempos kahe vastandi kiretangot. Filmi tõstab esile paeluvalt loodud ajaloopilt, kuid sellest veel enam on hästi välja joonistatud Walteri mäng Barbara tunnetega ja vastupidi. „Puurilinnud” on võimas lugu armastusest, mis lõikab kasu. 


![F_8_the_sign_painter_e51927cedf.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_8_the_sign_painter_e51927cedf_982694d348.jpg)

## [Sildimaalija](https://poff.ee/film/sildimaalija/)
- [18. nov, kolmapäev 17:15. iSense saal Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=323210&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

- Rahvusvaheline esilinastus, külalisteks Davis Suharevskis, Guntis Trekteris

„Sildimaalja” annab võluva krutskeid täis huumoriga edasi totalitaarse võimu jantliku poolt ääremail, kus uus kord tuleb liinitööna tänavapildis lihtsalt ära vormistada.

Anis elab pealtnäha lihtsat elu töötades sildimaalijana. Tööst mehel puudust ei tule, kuna ennastkehtestavad režiimid ei jäta ülekirjutamata ainsatki tänavanurka. Kommunismi ja natsionaalsotsialismi keerises ajavad maalikunstnikuks pürgiva Anise pea segi hoopis naised. Juudi kaupmehe tütrega Zislaga ei saa noormees abielluda usulistel põhjustel, sobilik läti neiu ei pane aga mehe südant selliselt lööma. Kõrvale jäetud Zisla loob aga käesolevates oludes parima võimaliku elu.


![F_1_quo_vadis_aida_edf7498fd3.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_quo_vadis_aida_edf7498fd3_94f72c0f41.jpg)

## [Quo Vadis, Aida?](https://poff.ee/film/quo-vadis-aida/)
- [18. nov, kolmapäev 21:00. Coca-Cola Plaza, Tallinn](https://store.piletilevi.ee/public/?concert=324278&shop_provider=pff&design=poff1&lang=est&center=7#view=ticketsselect)

Srebrenica genotsiid leidis aset 1995. aasta juulis, mille käigus viidi Bosnias ja Hertsegoviinas 25 000 – 30 000 põgeniku seas läbi etniline puhastus ning tapeti enam kui 8000 bosnia meest ja teismelist poissi. Srebrenica massimõrv on suurim massimõrv Euroopas pärast Teist maailmasõda. “Quo Vadis, Aida?” heidab juhtunule valgust.

Aida töötab ÜRO sõjaväebaasi varjupaigas Srebrenicas inglise keele õpetaja ja tõlgina. Tal tuleb hakkama saada meestekeskses sõjalise võimumaailmas, kus tema missiooni ja võitlusvaimu tõsiselt ei võeta. Kui linna tungivad Serbia väed, kes vilistavad ÜRO ultimaatumile, ei jää Aidal muud üle, kui astuda oma pere ja 30 000 elu nimel võitlustulle esirindes.

Tõestisündinud loo põhjal kirjutatud sõjadraama on pälvinud ohtralt tunnustust nii Veneetsia filmifestivali põhiprogrammis kui ka mujal maailmas suurepärase narratiivi ja näitlejatöö eest.

![F_5_teddy_46da2f4b96.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_5_teddy_46da2f4b96_7ccbb736b6.jpg)

## [Teddy](https://poff.ee/film/teddy/)
- [18. nov, kolmapäev 22:00. Apollo Kino Solaris, Tallinn](https://poff.ee/film/teddy/)

„Teddy” on pöörane lugu libahundist kaasaegses võtmes. Film pakub erilise seguna hirmujudinaid suurepärase visuaalse stilistikaga. Õudusfilmi žanris avab film äraspidises võtmes kõrvalejäetu vaimset maailma ning pakub pisarate asemel hoopis korraliku annuse huumorit.  

Püreneede väikekülas elab tahumatult karge natuuriga 19-aastane Teddy, kes suudab massažisalongis töötades oma kätega aga imet teha. Tema pruut on erinevalt Teddyst kooli lõpetamas ja plaanib pageda külaelu kammitsetud võimalustest suure helgema tuleviku suunas. Teddyl puudub eesootava elu ees igasugune plaan seni, kuni teda puudutab täiskuu ööl müstiline elukas.


![F_5_jumbo_3b6a4dc783.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_5_jumbo_3b6a4dc783_99bfcdcdee.jpg)

## [Jumbo](https://poff.ee/film/jumbo/)
- 18. nov, kolmapäev 19:45. Apollo Kino Solaris Tallinn

Sundance’i filmifestivalil esilinastunud „Jumbo” võtab julges võtmes ette debati armastuse lubatuse ja keelamise ümber. Selles nihestatud perspektiivis pakub film kõnekaid argumente ja värsket teemakäsitlust. Võimas ja originaalne film, mis ei ole läinud lihtsat teed valides alt.

Jeanne on häbelik introvert, kes elab koos oma emaga ja töötab lõbustuspargis puhastusteenindajana. Ta ei ole kunagi tundud, et sobiks ümbritsevasse ühiskonda. Vaid räämas lõbustuspargi maagilises maailmas suudab Jeanne kogeda kuuluvust ja kirge, mida tekitab temas lõbustuspargi atraktsioon nimega Jumbo. See on armastus esimesest kiigust.

title_et: Vaata PÖFFi auhinnatseremoonia otseülekannet algusega kell 19
title_en: Award Ceremony Live
title_ru: Трансляция с церемонии награждения PÖFF начнется в пятницу, в 19:00
lead_et: Elisa Stage toob PÖFFi tähtsündmuse koju kätte. Tähista koos meiega erakordse PÖFFi pidulikku Vene Teatris toimuvat auhinnagalat ning naudi otseülekande abil laureaatide võimsaid emotsioone ja muusikat. Õhtut juhib Mait Malmsten.
lead_ru: Elisa Stage проведет трансляцию с важного события PÖFF, и вы сможете посмотреть ее прямо из дома. Присоединяйтесь к нам на торжественной церемонии награждения, которая пройдет в Русском театре. Вечер проведет Майт Малмстен.
lead_en: On the 27th of November, the 24th edition of Tallinn Black Nights Film Festival will have its festive finale during the award ceremony. Join us for the LIVE-stream and share in the excitement, as we enjoy several performances and announce this year's winning movies!
contents_et:
**PÖFFi auhinnatseremoonia otseülekanne algab reedel kell 19 [siin lingil](https://poff.elisastage.ee/landing/bc/mZ1D2CpUpk/ZMZxe84enMW).**

Auhinnatseremoonia emotsioonid kütavad kuumaks Robert Linna ja Rita Ray, kes eriprojektina valminud The Motown Soundi koosseisus üles astuvad. Sellele järgnev auhindade sadu kergitab aga emotsioonid täielikult lakke.

Festivali auväärt žürii abil loetakse kokku maski vahele poetatud pisarad, mõõdetakse kinosaalidesse kõlama jäänud naerupahvakute detsibellid ja arvutatakse publiku maailmapildi avardumise summa summarum kilomeetrites.

Tutvu PÖFFi auhindadega [siin](https://poff.ee/artikkel/auhinnad/) ning uudista, kes kuuluvad tänavuse PÖFFi väärikasse žüriikoosseisu [siin](https://poff.ee/zuerii-1/).
contents_en:
**The Award Ceremony** will be **live** on **Friday the 27th at 19:00** [HERE](https://poff.elisastage.ee/landing/bc/mZ1D2CpUpk/ZMZxe84enMW)

On Friday, November 27th, the glorious Vene Teater will be the stage for PÖFF’s award ceremony. The ceremony will start at 19:00 and will host local as well as foreign guests from the film industry. The grand evening will be led by actor **Mait Malmsten**.

The special musical project **The Motown Sound** by **Robert Linna** and **Rita Ray** will get you wiggling in your chair, and warm you up for the rain of awards - getting the spirits really through the beautiful, chandeliered ceiling of the theatre.

With help of the festival’s honorable jury, we will count all the tears that have been shed into our face masks, the decibels of laughter that have filled the cinemas and homes, and the kilometers of broadened horizons.
Get to know all competitions of PÖFF [here](https://poff.ee/en/programmes/) and meet the [juries](https://poff.ee/en/poff_jurys/).

Read more about the Award Ceremony, and regulations when attending [here](https://poff.ee/en/about/award-ceremony/)
contents_ru:
**Прямая трансляция церемонии награждения PÖFF начнется в пятницу, в 19 [здесь](https://poff.elisastage.ee/landing/bc/mZ1D2CpUpk/ZMZxe84enMW).**

Атмосферу подогреют Роберт Линна и Рита Рей, которые выступят в составе спецпроекта. Затем последует самая волнительная часть вечера - вручение наград.

Ознакомиться с вручаемыми наградами можно [здесь](https://poff.ee/artikkel/auhinnad/), а состав жюри – [здесь](https://poff.ee/zuerii-1/).

title_en: Lazy Sunday gems at Black Nights day #3
lead_ru: Сегодня в кино: трагедия Норд-Оста и жизнь после нее в фильме «Конференция», экранизация романа Чарльза Диккенса «История Дэвида Копперфилда» и история художника Артура Пола – создателя одного из самых узнаваемых торговых знаков, зайца Playboy. Что посмотреть всей семьей? И что посмотреть на русском языке?
lead_en: Whether it's a historical drama or a portrait of the inventor of the Playboy bunny, one of our world premieres, Q&A's with film guests, or a special new award. Black Nights has got your easy Sunday covered. Book a ticket, sit back and unwind.
contents_en:
Good Sunday morning, film lovers! We hope you have settled in your home cinemas or found your way to the theatre already. If not, a lazy Sunday is a perfect time to spend watching some cinematic pearls to wind down, reenergize, and be inspired for the next week ahead. Day 3 at Black Nights brings tens of films to watch in a comfy red plush theatre seat or from your own couch. 

There are some delights for war-themed film lovers, historical films, tragicomedies, and several films that show us the beautiful varieties in which families can exist. And; because Sunday is also a good day to spend together with the family, why not see a film with the kids from the selection of [Just Film](https://justfilm.ee/en)? 

See the whole timetable for today [here](https://poff.ee/en/search_screening/?dates=11/14/2020), or scroll through some special recommendations below: 

![F_3_art_paul_of_playboy.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_3_art_paul_of_playboy_754afe0d7c.jpg)
### [Art Paul of Playboy: The Man Behind The Bunny](https://poff.ee/en/film/art-paul-of-playboy-the-man-behind-the-bunny/)
**15:45 | Apollo Solaris 3**

His masterpiece is known around the world: a drawing of a bunny en-profile, with little pearly cut-out eyes, wearing a bow-tie. The Playboy bunny. Art Paul, the designer of the iconic Playboy bunny logo and long-time art director for the magazine, created a lasting impact in graphic art and design. Even long after the prime time of Playboy. Beyond that, Art Paul was also a philosopher and wordsmith. This documentary, with archival footage and interviews, paints his portrait. 


![F_4_in_the_dusk.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_4_in_the_dusk_087c6af708.jpg)
### [In the Dusk](https://poff.ee/en/film/in-the-dusk/)
**16:30 Coca-Cola Plaza 4 LUXE**
**19:30 Virtual Hall**

A grim and strikingly atmospheric historical drama (the first one for Sharūnas Bartas) from a screenplay based on letters and testimonies of real partisans is magnificently shot by Eitvydas Doškus, who mostly uses the natural light and calmness of surrounding nature. Labeled by Cannes Film Festival, this Lithuanian film has intensively traveled from San Sebastian to Katowice, Haifa, Adelaide and Busan.

Year 1948. It is already the third year for Lithuanian partisans, who are fighting against Soviet occupants from forests in cold weather, hunger, and uncertainty. Teenager Unte secretly joins partisans to witness paranoia and betrayal.


![F_1_poppy_field.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_poppy_field_7f4b689391.jpg)
### [Poppy Field (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/poppy-field/)
**16:45 | Coca-Cola Plaza 7**
**19:45 | Virtual Hall**

"Poppy Field" is inspired by the cinema screening of Ivana Mladenovic’s award-winning drama film "Soldiers. A Story from Ferentari", which was interrupted due to protests. Only a few days before that, the screening of the French drama film "120 Beats per Minute" was interrupted at the same theatre due to religious reasons claiming that such LGBT films are the utter example of depravity. "Poppy Field" does not point an accusing finger to either side in this duel of freedom and piety. On the contrary, the film ties the explosive conflict into one main character. 


![F_6_mephistopheles.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_6_mephistopheles_f7a86cc297.jpg)
### [Mephistopheles (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/mephistopheles/)
**17:00 | Coca-Cola Plaza 8**
**Q&A with guests Manfred Vainokivi, Marju Lepp, Linnar Priimägi, Tambet Tuisk, Henri Kuus**

From time to time, Mephistopheles manifests himself to the Estonian people through Linnar Priimägi. The released energy gives birth to chaos. Manfred Vainokivi tries his hardest to portray the one who causes it. Unsuccessfully, of course. Because even the largest letters are unreadable in the twilight, as Goethe said. And there is a lot of twilight now. At least according to Linnar.

The best Estonian comedy of recent years. Or is it a tragicomedy?


![F_1_why_not_you_edb93c3018.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_why_not_you_edb93c3018_c4be73c28b.jpg)
### [Why not you (World Premiere)](https://poff.ee/en/film/why-not-you/)
**17:00 | Coca-Cola Plaza 8**
**Q&A with director and screenwriter Evi Romen**

Eccentric Mario who lives in an Alpine mountain village has always felt like a black sheep whose pulsating passion for modern dance and underground club culture does not fit in with the local conventional tradition patterns. Is home a place where you have been born and raised, or is it a place where you are expected and welcomed?



![the-personal-history-of-david-copperfield.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/the_personal_history_of_david_copperfield_e65535d42e.jpg)
### [The Personal History of David Copperfield](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-personal-history-of-david-copperfield/)
**17:15 | Coca-Cola Plaza 2**

Two artists or filmmakers whose recent work takes a concerted step forward in improving diversity and inclusion in the film industry and cinema culture [will receive the new DDA Spotlight Award](https://poff.ee/en/news/armando-iannucci-and-francis-annan-first-recipients-of-the-dda-spotlight-award/) this year. 

One of them is the director of The Personal History of David Copperfield: Armando Iannucci. A fresh and distinctive take on Charles Dickens' semi-autobiographical masterpiece, The Personal History of David Copperfield, set in the 1840s, chronicles the life of its iconic title character as he navigates a chaotic world to find his elusive place within it. 

At the screening, the award will be presented to Iannucci. Dennis Davidson of the DDA Group will introduce the film. 


![F_1_the_macaluso_sisters.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_the_macaluso_sisters_09cea7a0e6.jpg)
### [The Macaluso Sister](https://poff.ee/en/film/the-macaluso-sisters/)
**18:15 | Artis 1** 
**21:45 | Virtual Hall**

Maria, Pinuccia, Lia, Katia, Antonella. The childhood, adulthood, and old age of five sisters born and raised in an apartment on the top floor of a small block in the suburbs of Palermo, where they live alone, without their parents.

The sisters are based on the characters from Emma Dante’s award-winning play of the same title.


![F_2_falling.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_2_falling_395b75f153.jpg)
### [Falling](https://poff.ee/en/film/falling/)
**20:15 | Coca-Cola Plaza 2** 
**22:30 | Virtual Hall** 

A film by the multi-talented Viggo Mortensen - who directed, produced, acted, and wrote the music score for this film. John Petersen (Mortensen) lives with his partner Eric and their adopted daughter Monica in Southern California. His father Willis is a farmer whose attitudes and behaviour belong to a far more traditional era and family model. When Willis travels to Los Angeles for an indefinite stay with John’s family in order to search for a place to retire, these two very different worlds collide.


![F_1_conference_02547de46e.jpg](http://139.59.130.149/uploads/F_1_conference_02547de46e_d091b358e1.jpg)
### [Conference](https://poff.ee/en/film/conference/)
**20:30 | Apollo Solaris 3**

The shocking story of one family against the backdrop of one of the greatest tragedies of 21st-century Russian history. Natalia, a nun from a remote Russian monastery, comes to Moscow 17 years after the terrorist attack on the Dubrovka Theatre. She has been sent there to organize a memorial evening for the victims of the attack in which, during a performance, armed Chechen militants took over the theatre. A hundred and thirty hostages were killed. Natalia and her family were witnesses of the attack. They survived.
contents_ru:
**ДЛЯ ВСЕЙ СЕМЬИ**

Для воскресного похода в кино всей семьей рекомендуем российский фильм [«Скажи ей»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/skazhi-ej/) со Светланой Ходченковой в главных ролях, а также культовый эстонский мультфильм «Сипсик».

[«Сипсик»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/sipsik/), 12:15, Apollo Kino Solaris
Наконец-то, появился мультфильм и с одним из самых любимых героев эстонской детской литературы, тряпичной куклой Сипсиком. Фильм Меэлиса Арулеппа и Карстена Килериха полон музыки, приключений и истинных чувств. Это история об очень необычной и чрезвычайно милой живой кукле и о братской и сестринской любви, которая преодолевает даже самые серьезные испытания. Созданный Эно Раудом и Эдгаром Вальтером чудесный литературный персонаж, с которым выросли родители сегодняшних малышей, символизирует собой детскую непосредственность, любопытство ко всему окружающему, неуёмный характер, всепобеждающую дружбу и негасимую любовь.
Мультфильм на эстонском языке с русскими субтитрами.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PYjjABpCz1s" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Скажи ей»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/skazhi-ej/), 17:00, Apollo Kino Solaris
Фильм Александра Молочникова показывает сложный мир Саши, родители которого развелись. Каждый из них пытается перетягивать одеяло на себя. Мальчик прилагает титанические усилия для сохранения хороших отношений и с мамой, и с папой. Кинолента участвует в конкурсной программе молодежных фильмов фестиваля Just Film. 
Международная премьера фильма «Скажи ей» состоялась вчера в Кохтла-Ярве. Зрители прокомментировали: «смелый выбор» и «фильм, который влияет на мировоззрение».

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kDO6SUm12Ws" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

**ОБЩИЕ РЕКОМЕНДАЦИИ**

[«История Дэвида Копперфилда»](https://poff.ee/film/david-copperfieldi-isiklik-elulugu/), 18:15, Coca-Cola Plaza
Красочная история молодого писателя Дэвида Копперфилда, полная удивительных людей и событий. Фильм снят по мотивам романа Чарльза Диккенса «Жизнь Дэвида Копперфилда, рассказанная им самим». Режиссер создал свою версию, оставив все более-менее как было, но при этом перевернув все с ног на голову. Картина с прекрасными актерами и острыми диалогами. Фильм покажут с русскими субтитрами.
Один единственный спецпоказ на фестивале состоится именно сегодня. На киносеансе вручат премию DDA создателю фильма Армандо Ианнуччи. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/plPHusuns4I" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Конференция»](https://poff.ee/ru/film/conference/), Apollo Kino Solaris
Премьера фильма «Конференция» состоялась в 2020 году в российском павильоне на Каннском фестивале, затем фильм вошел в программу Венецианского фестиваля (конкурс авторского кино Venice Days). На «Кинотавре» ему присудили приз за лучший сценарий.
Картина посвящена трагическим событиям 2002 года на представлении «Норд-Ост», когда террористы захватили зрителей в заложники. Иван Твердовский показал историю женщины, которой удалось спастись дорогой ценой, после чего она уходит в монахини и в течение уже 18 лет пытается искупить свою вину. Она проводит вечер памяти жертв трагедии, который они вынуждены назвать конференцией. Вместе с остальными участниками они преодолевают посттравматический синдром.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HgBWDm2sMDk" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

«Арт Пол из Playboy: человек, который создал зайца», 16:45, Apollo Kino Solaris
Фильм из программы фестиваля #POFFtrending об Арт Поле – один из основателей мужского журнала Playboy и создатель его логотипа в виде зайчика с бабочкой.
Лёгкий, приправленный юмором документальный фильм, который повествует о своеобразном культурном феномене и рассматривает, почему Playboy стал иконой и как это в целом повлияло на прежнее отношение к искусству и изображении тела в целом. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XH78iC8hhe8" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Падение»](https://poff.ee/film/langemine/), 21:15, Coca-Cola Plaza 
Вигго Мортенсен – лауреат Сан-Себастьяна, многократный кандидат на «Оскар», который также был номинирован на престижную премию BAFTA. «Падение» – это его первая проба пера на режиссерском поприще, в котором он также исполнил главную роль и создал музыкальный ряд. Это очень личная личная драма об отношениях уже взрослого сына со стареющим отцом.
Фильм можно посмотреть и в онлайн-кинотеатре.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2vb1_3WvaZo" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

**ФИЛЬМЫ С РУССКИМИ СУБТИТРАМИ**

[«Шарлатан»](https://poff.ee/film/sarlatan/), 13:45, Kino Artis 
«Шарлатан» показывает жизненную историю чехословацкого целителя Яна Миколашека. Талантливый лекарь имеет заслуженную репутацию среди народа. Сменяющие друг друга нацистская и советская власти пытаются использовать его репутацию в своих целях. Режиссер Аннешка Холланд исследует в этом фильме взаимосвязи между частной жизнью и политикой, а также ход жизни удивительного человека.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0K2VypjntDc" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Райн»](https://poff.ee/film/rain/), 14:15, Coca-Cola Plaza
На фестивале состоится международная премьера фильма «Райн» от начинающего эстонского режиссера Янно Юргенса. В драме о взрослении показано переплетение трех поколений мужчин в условиях небольшого городка. Фильм представлен в конкурсной программе фильмов из стран Балтии, 
Фильм доступен и в онлайн-кинотеатре.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O02YBIa6aOs" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[«Отец»](https://poff.ee/film/isa/), 19:00, Apollo Kino Solaris
«Отец» – дебютная работа маститого драматурга Флориана Зеллера, снятая по его же пьесе. 80-летний Энтони стареет, начинает забывать, где и с кем находится, но при этом не соглашается на сиделку. Дочь Энтони, однако не собирается опускать руки. 
Выбор критиков Screen International, фильм «Сандэнса – 2020». Драма со звёздным актерским составом: главные роли исполнили Оливия Колман, Оливия Уильямс, Марк Гейтисс и Энтони Хопкинс. Оценка кинокритиков в мире согласно порталу kinopoisk.ru составляет 100% положительных отзывов. И сложно представить более удачный повод посмотреть кино высочайшего класса. Повторные сеансы ожидаются 21 и 29 ноября.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4TZb7YfK-JI" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

contents_et:
Nordic Hotel Forum nimetati Eesti Vabariigi kultuuriministri poolt 2019. aasta kultuurisõbraks. Tunnustuse teenisime teiste seas ka koostöö eest PÖFFiga, mis on olnud meile iga-aastane tippsündmus. Nordic Hotel Forum olnud PÖFFi sündmuste südameks ja väliskülaliste teiseks koduks alates 2008. aastast.

Tänavu keskendume aga hoopiski sellele, et järgmise aasta festivalil saaksime pakkuda PÖFFi külastajatele veelgi kaasaegsemat, turvalisemat ja mugavamat festivalikogemust. Avame uuenduskuuri läbi teinud hotelli kevadel 2021.
contents_en:
Nordic Hotel Forum was named the 2019 Friend of Culture by the Minister of Culture of the Republic of Estonia. Among other things, we earned the recognition thanks to our cooperation with PÖFF which has been a top event for us every year. Nordic Hotel Forum has been the heart of PÖFF’s events and the second home for foreign guests since 2008.

However, this year we focus on being able to offer PÖFF’s guests an even more modern, secure and convenient festival experience at the next year’s festival. We shall open the rejuvenated hotel in spring 2021.

contents_et:
Solaris keskus on ka sel aastal pöffihuntide oluliseks kogunemiskohaks. Nii Apollo kui ka Artise kinodes saab nautida PÖFFi filmiprogrammi. Filmielamust jahtima tulles saavad kõik külastajad parkida linna soodsaimas siseparklas.  

Filmi ette või peale pakub Solaris keskus maitseelamusi kohvikutes ja restoranides, kus saavad söönuks kõik pöffihundid. Lisaks pakub keskus rikkaliku valikut heast disainist ja kvaliteedist lugupidavatele pöffihuntidele. PÖFF on hea aeg jahtida nende seast endale parimad pakkumised!
contents_en:
The Solaris Centre is an important gathering point for the PÖFF Wolves also this year. PÖFF’s film programmes can be enjoyed at both the Apollo Cinema and the Artis Cinema. When coming hunting for a film experience, guests can park in the least expensive indoor parking lot in the city.

The Solaris Centre offers taste experiences both before and after films at cafes and restaurants where all the PÖFF Wolves can get their fill. The Centre also offers a broad selection of outlets for PÖFF Wolves who value good design and quality. PÖFF is a good time to hunt for the best offers from among that selection!
